prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Philip Whalen Correspondence, MSS 0264. Mandeville Special Collections Library, UCSD.

scopecontent.head: SCOPE AND CONTENT
scopecontent.p: Letter and typescript copy of the text from a postcard sent by Tram Combs to Whalen, both concerning a collection of San Francisco Bay Area poets' works that Combs was putting together.
